room_title: Escape room "School of Magic" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: School of Magic room was awesome! The staff was very helpful. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "School of Magic" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: This was my second escape room and we completed the School of Magic in 30 minutes. When the final door opened, we all said that was it, we're done? There weren't enough puzzles, a lot of what we had to do didn't really make sense and one of the clues wasn't working properly. It was fun, but should be done with a much smaller group. We had 8 people and it would maybe be more challenging with 3 or 4.

room_title: Escape room "School of Magic" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: Did the School of Magic room and had so much fun. Loved Owen!
